title: Wear for Twitter
summary: Manage your Twitter account from your wrist alternative way .

description: Available for your SmartWatch Android Wear, more complete version to follow your twitter timeline discreetly .All available options , searches tweet , retweet , mark favorites , create a Tweet , view your timeline , follow new users, view images , etc ...This application is not approved by, sponsored by or affiliate with Twitter Inc.
descriptionHTML:
Available for your SmartWatch Android Wear, more complete version to follow your twitter timeline discreetly .

All available options , searches tweet , retweet , mark favorites , create a Tweet , view your timeline , follow new users, view images , etc ...


This application is not approved by, sponsored by or affiliate with Twitter Inc.
comments: Useless Doesn't work in the background, you have to manually start it. Then it doesn't download pictures automatically, you have to wait!! Deleted.
developer and customer support dont speak english fake app! buyer beware!
